definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: deal violently with, despoil, devastate, ruin (NH id., Niph.; Ar. sad=a stop up, obstruct, arrest, make firm; Eth. sadada: expel; As. šadâdu is draw, drag);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְשָֽׁדְדוּ]] Ez Eze 32:12; sf. [[שַׁדּוּנִי]] Ps 17:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇשׁוּד]] (metapl., cf. Ges:§ 67 q Bae) Ps 91:6 sf. [[יְשָׁדֵּם]] (Ges:§ 67 n) Pr 11:3 Qr (Kt Pf. [[ושׁדם]]), [[יְשָׁדְדֵם]] Je 5:6; Imv. mpl. [[שָׁדְדו]] (Ges:§ 67 cc) Je 49:28; Inf. abs. [[שָׁדוֹד]] Mic 2:4; cstr. [[לִשְׁדוֹד]] Je 47:4 (Ges:§ 45 g), cf. also [[שׁׂד]] Ho 10:14; Pt. act. [[שׁׂדֵד]] Je 6:26 +,etc.; pass. [[שָׁדוּד]] Ju Jdg 5:27 +, f. [[שְׁדוּדָה]] Ps 137:8;—violently destory, pers., = slay Ju Jdg 5:27 (pass.), Je 5:6 (wolf subj.; ‖[[הִכָּה ]]); acc. Philistines Je 47:4 (‖[[הִכְרִית ]]), v:Je 47:4 (subj. ´[[י]]:); = devastate, acc. [[בָּבֶל]] (subj. ´[[י]]:) Je 51:55, cf. Ps 137:8 (rd. prob. [[הַשּׁׂדֵדָה]] We Du, cf. Ew Hi [[הַשָּׁדוֹדָה]] v. Kö:ii.194); [[אֶת־גְּאוֹן מִחְרַיִם]] Ez Eze 32:12 (‖[[נִשְׁמַד ]]), cf. Ho 10:14, [[אֶת־מַרְעִיתָם]] Je 25:36 (subj. ´[[י]]:), abs. Is 21:2 (‖[[בָּגַד ]]), Is 33:1 (on use of pt v. Ges:§ 120 b), pass v:Is 33:1 (‖[[בָּגַד ]]), [[אַתְּי שָׁדוּד]] Je 4:30 (Gf Ba:NB 179, but dub.; < Du [[שְׁדוּדָה]]); = despoil, acc. pers. Je 49:28; = bring pers. to ruin Mic 2:4 (Inf. abs. + Niph. q.v.), Pr 11:3; weaker, assail Ps 17:9; elsewhere Pt. act. as subst. devastator (despoiler?): of national foes Is 16:4, Is 21:2, Is 33:1, Je 6:26 + 8 t. Je; [[שׁוֹדְדֵי לַיְלָה]] Ob:Ob 5 (‖[[גַּנׇּבִים ]]) del. Now GASm; personal foe Job 15:21; representing wicked in gen. Job 12:6 (‖[[מַרְגִּיזֵי אֵל ]]). †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 pl. [[שָׁדוֹד נְשַׁדֻּנוּ]] (Ges:§ 67 u Kö:i. 342 f.) we are utterly ruined. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[אַל־תְּשַׁדֵּד רִבְחוֹ]] Pr 24:15 assault not his dwelling-place (‖[[אַל־אֱֶרׂב ]]); Pt. as subst. [[מְשַׁדֶּד־אָב]] Pr 19:26 he who assaults, maltreats (his) father (‖[[יַבְרִיחַ אֵם ]]). †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[שֻׁדַּד]] Is 15:1 +, 3 fs. [[שֻׁדְּדָה]] Je 4:20 +, [[שָׁדְּדָה]] Na 3:7 (Ges:§ 52q), etc.;—be devastated, of city Is 15:1, Is 15:1, Is 23:1, Je 48:1, Je 49:3, Na 3:7, country or nation Je 4:20, cf. v:Je 4:13, Je 9:18, Je 48:15, Je 48:20, Je 49:10, dwellings ([[אׂהֶל]]) Je 4:20, Je 10:20, trees Zec 11:2 (del. Sta:ZAW 1 (1881), 25), cf. v:33, stength of ships Is 23:14, field (by drought) Joe 1:10, crop v:Joe 1:10. † Pō‘l. violently destroy: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְשׁׂרֵד מַצֵּבוֹתָם]] Ho 10:2 (‖[[יַעֲרׂף מִוְבְּחׂתָם ]]). †

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: pass. Impf. ? cf. Ges:§ 53 u) be devastated: 3 ms. [[כָּל־מִבְחָרֶיךָ יוּשָָּׁד]] Ho 10:14 (of Ephr., < We pl. [[יושׁדו]]); 2 ms. [[תּוּשַּׁד]] Is 33:1 (subj. [[שׁוֹדֵד]], v.
